law.text: It shall be unlawful to operate or maintain a network without first obtaining a license from the Cabinet for Health and Family Services. A network shall not require a certificate of need.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 496, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 443, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 482, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
